usage: Strength training and gym or home exercise workouts using fixed-weight dumbbells.
key_features: Able to be washed without damage
ai_description: A pair of compact blue fixed dumbbells with hexagonal ends rests on light surfaces and a speckled gym floor. Each dumbbell has crisp white “KAKSS” branding and “4 KG” weight markings on the end, with a smooth coated finish that gives a clean, modern gym look.
target_audience: People doing strength training or general fitness at home or in the gym who need 4 kg dumbbells.
product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Fixed Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (4 kg set of 2, Blue)
